property.name: name
property.label: Name
property.default: Health & Safety App = Capture Incidents With Mobile device
property.description: The Name or Label displayed in the center of each tile in order to identify the record

property.name: image
property.label: Image Rich Text
property.description: The Rich Text content to display as image, accepts a HTML String. For full description visit the documentation

property.name: recordType
property.label: Record Type
property.description: The Name or Label which is displayed as an overlay over the image

property.name: recommended
property.label: Recommended
property.description: The checkbox determines whether a tile is recommended or not

property.name: points
property.label: Integer
property.description: The number of points displayed in tile

property.name: category
property.label: Categories
property.description: The comma separated value list of values to display underneath the image

property.name: creator
property.label: Creator
property.description: The Name or Label which is displayed as the author of the record

property.name: creatorImage
property.label: Creator Image
property.description: The URL of Image to display as Author's avatar

property.name: voteSobject
property.label: Vote sObject
property.description: The API Name of an Object which looks up to the current object and is intended to work as a means of storing votes, for further clarification visit the documentation

property.name: voteField
property.label: Vote sObject Field
property.description: The API Name of a Checkbox field on Voting object which indicates whether a vote record is positive or negative (Negatives records are Ignored)

property.name: customField
property.label: Custom Field
property.description: The Name or Label which is displayed as an overlay between the Name and voting section
